member.name: M:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebEmailControl.FormComponentConfig(Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.AptifyFormTemplateContext)
member.summary: In addition to base class functionality, this method will setup the email controls for the form. This class will create a text box for each control and place the list of email fields on the left side of the text box

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebEmailControl.AutoFindEmailFields
member.summary: Tells the Contol to disregard the FieldString and interrogate the Entity for Email Fields.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebEmailControl.EmailFieldListWidth
member.summary: Controls the Width of the Email Field Drop Down.
member.remarks: The Text Box will will the remainder of the Control.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebEmailControl.FieldString
member.summary: Gets/Sets a | delimited string of field names.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.WebEmailControl
member.summary: Aptify Web Email Control for ASP.NET 2.x+ - displays one or more email addresses based on the number of email fields that exist within a given entity definition. Scans the entity definition when configured and automatically pulls in all of the email addresses based on the ExtendedType attributes of the top-level entity fields. Alternatively, the AutoFindEmailFields property can be set to False, and the fields that should be displayed can be set via the FieldString Input Property of the form component.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.My.Resources.Resources.ResourceManager
member.summary: Returns the cached ResourceManager instance used by this class.

member.name: P:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.My.Resources.Resources.Culture
member.summary: Overrides the current thread's CurrentUICulture property for all resource lookups using this strongly typed resource class.

member.name: T:Aptify.Framework.Web.Common.My.Resources.Resources
member.summary: A strongly-typed resource class, for looking up localized strings, etc.
